# Base Math

> Standard library math base implementations.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var math = require( '@stdlib/math/base' );
```

#### math

Standard library base math.

```javascript
var ns = math;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
